1: וּבֹ֨עַז <sup>1162 </sup> <n>Boaz</n> עָלָ֣ה <sup>5927 </sup> <n>up</n> הַשַּׁעַר֮ <sup>8179 </sup> <n>to the gate</n> וַיֵּ֣שֶׁב <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and sat him down</n> שָׁם֒ <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> וְהִנֵּ֨ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>and behold</n> הַגֹּאֵ֤ל <sup>1350 </sup> <n>there and behold the kinsman</n> עֹבֵר֙ <sup>5674 </sup> <n>came</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>of whom</n> דִּבֶּר־ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>spake</n> בֹּ֔עַז <sup>1162 </sup> <n>of whom Boaz</n> וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>by unto whom he said</n> ס֥וּרָה <sup>5493 </sup> <n>turn aside</n> שְׁבָה־ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>sit down</n> פֹּ֖ה <sup>6311 </sup> <n>here</n> פְּלֹנִ֣י <sup>6423 </sup> <n>such</n> אַלְמֹנִ֑י <sup>492 </sup> <n>a one</n> וַיָּ֖סַר <sup>5493 </sup> <n>here And he turned aside</n> וַיֵּשֵֽׁב׃ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and sat down</n>
2: וַיִּקַּ֞ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>And he took</n> עֲשָׂרָ֧ה <sup>6235 </sup> <n>ten</n> אֲנָשִׁ֛ים <sup>582 </sup> <n>men</n> מִזִּקְנֵ֥י <sup>2205 </sup> <n>of the elders</n> הָעִ֖יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of the city</n> וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> שְׁבוּ־ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>Sit ye down</n> פֹ֑ה <sup>6311 </sup> <n>here</n> וַיֵּשֵֽׁבוּ׃ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>here And they sat down</n>
3: וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>And he said</n> לַגֹּאֵ֔ל <sup>1350 </sup> <n>unto the kinsman</n> חֶלְקַת֙ <sup>2513 </sup> <n>a parcel</n> הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <sup>7704 </sup> <n>out of the country</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> לְאָחִ֖ינוּ <sup>251 </sup> <n>which [was] our brother</n> לֶאֱלִימֶ֑לֶךְ <sup>458 </sup> <n>Elimelech's</n> מָכְרָ֣ה <sup>4376 </sup> <n>selleth</n> נָעֳמִ֔י <sup>5281 </sup> <n>Naomi</n> הַשָּׁ֖בָה <sup>7725 </sup> <n>that is come again</n> מִשְּׂדֵ֥ה <sup>7704 </sup> <n>of land</n> מוֹאָֽב׃ <sup>4124 </sup> <n>of Moab</n>
4: וַאֲנִ֨י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> אָמַ֜רְתִּי <sup>559 </sup> <n>And I thought</n> אֶגְלֶ֧ה <sup>1540 </sup> <n>advertise</n> אָזְנְךָ֣ <sup>241 </sup> <n>you</n> לֵאמֹ֗ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>thee saying</n> קְ֠נֵה <sup>7069 </sup> <n>Buy</n> נֶ֥גֶד <sup>5048 </sup> <n>before</n> הַֽיֹּשְׁבִים֮ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>[it] before the inhabitants</n> וְנֶ֣גֶד <sup>5048 </sup> <n>and before</n> זִקְנֵ֣י <sup>2205 </sup> <n>and before the elders</n> עַמִּי֒ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of my people</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> תִּגְאַל֙ <sup>1350 </sup> <n>If thou wilt redeem</n> גְּאָ֔ל <sup>1350 </sup> <n>[it] redeem</n> וְאִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>if</n> לֹ֨א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יִגְאַ֜ל <sup>1350 </sup> <n>[it] but if thou wilt not redeem</n> הַגִּ֣ידָה <sup>5046 </sup> <n>[it then] tell</n> לִּ֗י [וְאֵדַע כ] (וְאֵֽדְעָה֙ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>acknowledge</n> ק) כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אֵ֤ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>there</n> זוּלָֽתְךָ֙ <sup>2108 </sup> <n>[it] beside</n> לִגְא֔וֹל <sup>1350 </sup> <n>for [there is] none to redeem</n> וְאָנֹכִ֖י <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> אַחֲרֶ֑יךָ <sup>310 </sup> <n>thee and I [am] after</n> וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>thee And he said</n> אָנֹכִ֥י <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> אֶגְאָֽל׃ <sup>1350 </sup> <n>I will redeem</n>
5: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Then said</n> בֹּ֔עַז <sup>1162 </sup> <n>Boaz</n> בְּיוֹם־ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>What day</n> קְנוֹתְךָ֥ <sup>7069 </sup> <n>thou buyest</n> הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <sup>7704 </sup> <n>the field</n> מִיַּ֣ד <sup>3027 </sup> <n>of the hand</n> נָעֳמִ֑י <sup>5281 </sup> <n>of Naomi</n> וּ֠מֵאֵת <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> ר֣וּת <sup>7327 </sup> <n>[it] also of Ruth</n> הַמּוֹאֲבִיָּ֤ה <sup>4125 </sup> <n>the Moabitess</n> אֵֽשֶׁת־ <sup>802 </sup> <n>the wife</n> הַמֵּת֙ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>of the dead</n> [קָנִיתִי כ] (קָנִ֔יתָה <sup>7069 </sup> <n>buy</n> ק) לְהָקִ֥ים <sup>6965 </sup> <n>to raise up</n> שֵׁם־ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>the name</n> הַמֵּ֖ת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>of the dead</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> נַחֲלָתֽוֹ׃ <sup>5159 </sup> <n>upon his inheritance</n>
6: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> הַגֹּאֵ֗ל <sup>1350 </sup> <n>And the kinsman</n> לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> אוּכַל֙ <sup>3201 </sup> <n>I cannot</n> [לִגְאֹול־ כ] (לִגְאָל־ <sup>1350 </sup> <n>Redeem</n> ק) <sup>1350 </sup> <n>redeem</n> פֶּן־ <sup>6435 </sup> <n>because</n> אַשְׁחִ֖ית <sup>7843 </sup> <n>[it] for myself lest I mar</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> נַחֲלָתִ֑י <sup>5159 </sup> <n>mine own inheritance</n> גְּאַל־ <sup>1350 </sup> <n>redeem</n> לְךָ֤ אַתָּה֙ <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> גְּאֻלָּתִ֔י <sup>1353 </sup> <n>thou my right</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> אוּכַ֖ל <sup>3201 </sup> <n>to thyself for I cannot</n> לִגְאֹֽל׃ <sup>1350 </sup> <n>redeem</n>
7: וְזֹאת֩ <sup>2063 </sup> <n>in</n> לְפָנִ֨ים <sup>6440 </sup> <n>Now this [was the manner] in former time</n> בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>in Israel</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>concerning</n> הַגְּאוּלָּ֤ה <sup>1353 </sup> <n>concerning redeeming</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>concerning</n> הַתְּמוּרָה֙ <sup>8545 </sup> <n>and concerning changing</n> לְקַיֵּ֣ם <sup>6965 </sup> <n>for to confirm</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>any</n> דָּבָ֔ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>all things</n> שָׁלַ֥ף <sup>8025 </sup> <n>plucked off</n> אִ֛ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>a man</n> נַעֲל֖וֹ <sup>5275 </sup> <n>his shoe</n> וְנָתַ֣ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and gave</n> לְרֵעֵ֑הוּ <sup>7453 </sup> <n>[it] to his neighbour</n> וְזֹ֥את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>was the</n> הַתְּעוּדָ֖ה <sup>8584 </sup> <n>and this [was] a testimony</n> בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>in Israel</n>
8: וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> הַגֹּאֵ֛ל <sup>1350 </sup> <n>Therefore the kinsman</n> לְבֹ֖עַז <sup>1162 </sup> <n>unto Boaz</n> קְנֵה־ <sup>7069 </sup> <n>Buy</n> לָ֑ךְ וַיִּשְׁלֹ֖ף <sup>8025 </sup> <n>[it] for thee So he drew off</n> נַעֲלֽוֹ׃ <sup>5275 </sup> <n>his shoe</n>
9: וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> בֹּ֨עַז <sup>1162 </sup> <n>And Boaz</n> לַזְּקֵנִ֜ים <sup>2205 </sup> <n>unto the elders</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> הָעָ֗ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>and [unto] all the people</n> עֵדִ֤ים <sup>5707 </sup> <n>Ye [are] witnesses</n> אַתֶּם֙ <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> הַיּ֔וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>this day</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> קָנִ֙יתִי֙ <sup>7069 </sup> <n>that I have bought</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>that</n> לֶֽאֱלִימֶ֔לֶךְ <sup>458 </sup> <n>all that [was] Elimelech's</n> וְאֵ֛ת <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>that</n> לְכִלְי֖וֹן <sup>3630 </sup> <n>and all that [was] Chilion's</n> וּמַחְל֑וֹן <sup>4248 </sup> <n>and Mahlon's</n> מִיַּ֖ד <sup>3027 </sup> <n>of the hand</n> נָעֳמִֽי׃ <sup>5281 </sup> <n>of Naomi</n>
10: וְגַ֣ם <sup>1571 </sup> <n>Moreover</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> ר֣וּת <sup>7327 </sup> <n>Moreover Ruth</n> הַמֹּאֲבִיָּה֩ <sup>4125 </sup> <n>the Moabitess</n> אֵ֨שֶׁת <sup>802 </sup> <n>the wife</n> מַחְל֜וֹן <sup>4248 </sup> <n>of Mahlon</n> קָנִ֧יתִי <sup>7069 </sup> <n>have I purchased</n> לִ֣י לְאִשָּׁ֗ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>to be my wife</n> לְהָקִ֤ים <sup>6965 </sup> <n>to raise up</n> שֵׁם־ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>the name</n> הַמֵּת֙ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>of the dead</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> נַ֣חֲלָת֔וֹ <sup>5159 </sup> <n>upon his inheritance</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יִכָּרֵ֧ת <sup>3772 </sup> <n>be not cut off</n> שֵׁם־ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>that the name</n> הַמֵּ֛ת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>of the dead</n> מֵעִ֥ם <sup>5973 </sup> <n>from among</n> אֶחָ֖יו <sup>251 </sup> <n>his brethren</n> וּמִשַּׁ֣עַר <sup>8179 </sup> <n>and from the gate</n> מְקוֹמ֑וֹ <sup>4725 </sup> <n>of his place</n> עֵדִ֥ים <sup>5707 </sup> <n>ye [are] witnesses</n> אַתֶּ֖ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> הַיּֽוֹם׃ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>this day</n>
11: וַיֹּ֨אמְר֜וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> הָעָ֧ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>And all the people</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> בַּשַּׁ֛עַר <sup>8179 </sup> <n>that [were] in the gate</n> וְהַזְּקֵנִ֖ים <sup>2205 </sup> <n>and the elders</n> עֵדִ֑ים <sup>5707 </sup> <n>[We are] witnesses</n> יִתֵּן֩ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>make</n> יְהוָ֨ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> אֶֽת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָאִשָּׁ֜ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>the woman</n> הַבָּאָ֣ה <sup>935 </sup> <n>that is come</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>into</n> בֵּיתֶ֗ךָ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>into thine house</n> כְּרָחֵ֤ל ׀ <sup>7354 </sup> <n>like Rachel</n> וּכְלֵאָה֙ <sup>3812 </sup> <n>and like Leah</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>of whom</n> בָּנ֤וּ <sup>1129 </sup> <n>did build</n> שְׁתֵּיהֶם֙ <sup>8147 </sup> <n>which two</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בֵּ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>the house</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> וַעֲשֵׂה־ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and do</n> חַ֣יִל <sup>2428 </sup> <n>thou worthily</n> בְּאֶפְרָ֔תָה <sup>672 </sup> <n>in Ephratah</n> וּקְרָא־ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>and become</n> שֵׁ֖ם <sup>8034 </sup> <n>base</n> בְּבֵ֥ית לָֽחֶם׃ <sup>1035 </sup> <n>in Bethlehem</n>
12: וִיהִ֤י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> בֵֽיתְךָ֙ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>And let thy house</n> כְּבֵ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>be like the house</n> פֶּ֔רֶץ <sup>6557 </sup> <n>of Pharez</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> יָלְדָ֥ה <sup>3205 </sup> <n>bare</n> תָמָ֖ר <sup>8559 </sup> <n>whom Tamar</n> לִֽיהוּדָ֑ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>unto Judah</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>through</n> הַזֶּ֗רַע <sup>2233 </sup> <n>of the seed</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> יִתֵּ֤ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>shall give</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>which the LORD</n> לְךָ֔ מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>through</n> הַֽנַּעֲרָ֖ה <sup>5291 </sup> <n>thee of this young woman</n> הַזֹּֽאת׃ <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n>
13: וַיִּקַּ֨ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>took</n> בֹּ֤עַז <sup>1162 </sup> <n>So Boaz</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> רוּת֙ <sup>7327 </sup> <n>Ruth</n> וַתְּהִי־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>became</n> ל֣וֹ לְאִשָּׁ֔ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>and she was his wife</n> וַיָּבֹ֖א <sup>935 </sup> <n>and when he went in</n> אֵלֶ֑יהָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>gave</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto her the LORD</n> לָ֛הּ הֵרָי֖וֹן <sup>2032 </sup> <n>her conception</n> וַתֵּ֥לֶד <sup>3205 </sup> <n>and she bare</n> בֵּֽן׃ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>a son</n>
14: וַתֹּאמַ֤רְנָה <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> הַנָּשִׁים֙ <sup>802 </sup> <n>And the women</n> אֶֽל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> נָעֳמִ֔י <sup>5281 </sup> <n>unto Naomi</n> בָּר֣וּךְ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>Blessed</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>[be] the LORD</n> אֲ֠שֶׁר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>has not</n> הִשְׁבִּ֥ית <sup>7673 </sup> <n>which hath not left</n> לָ֛ךְ גֹּאֵ֖ל <sup>1350 </sup> <n>without a kinsman</n> הַיּ֑וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>thee this day</n> וְיִקָּרֵ֥א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>may be famous</n> שְׁמ֖וֹ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>that his name</n> בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>in Israel</n>
15: וְהָ֤יָה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לָךְ֙ לְמֵשִׁ֣יב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>And he shall be unto thee a restorer</n> נֶ֔פֶשׁ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>of [thy] life</n> וּלְכַלְכֵּ֖ל <sup>3557 </sup> <n>and a nourisher</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שֵׂיבָתֵ֑ךְ <sup>7872 </sup> <n>of thine old age</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> כַלָּתֵ֤ךְ <sup>3618 </sup> <n>for thy daughter in law</n> אֲ‍ֽשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> אֲהֵבַ֙תֶךְ֙ <sup>157 </sup> <n>which loveth</n> יְלָדַ֔תּוּ <sup>3205 </sup> <n>hath born</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> הִיא֙ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>and is</n> ט֣וֹבָה <sup>2896 </sup> <n>thee which is better</n> לָ֔ךְ מִשִּׁבְעָ֖ה <sup>7651 </sup> <n>to thee than seven</n> בָּנִֽים׃ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>sons</n>
16: וַתִּקַּ֨ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>took</n> נָעֳמִ֤י <sup>5281 </sup> <n>And Naomi</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַיֶּ֙לֶד֙ <sup>3206 </sup> <n>the child</n> וַתְּשִׁתֵ֣הוּ <sup>7896 </sup> <n>and laid</n> בְחֵיקָ֔הּ <sup>2436 </sup> <n>it in her bosom</n> וַתְּהִי־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>and became</n> ל֖וֹ לְאֹמֶֽנֶת׃ <sup>539 </sup> <n>and became nurse</n>
